longInfo:
Passport required.  
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued to
  nationals of Andorra must be valid on arrival. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days(SEE NOTE
53555):
    NOTE 53555: The max. stay is granted within 180 days.
 - for nationals of Andorra; 
Additional Information:
- Extension of stay possible for visitors who are visa exempt
  for a max. stay of 90 days. Fee: LTL 60.-.
Warning:
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued more
  than 10 years prior to date of travel are not accepted
